values.description: A Short Box Spread is an arbitration strategy that invert a box spread. It combines a bear call spread and a bull put spread.
values.keywords: Short Box Spread option strategy, bear call spread, bull put spread, box spread, arbitration, delta neutral, strategy payoff, risk of early assignment
